text: Roddy puffed at his pipe, his eyes fixed on the white-coated barman. 'Oh, I think it does, Hugh. That's why I want you to meet this bird. I think he fills in an important part of the background. Furthermore, dear boy, it confirms what we already know of your father's intention to leave the country on the night of October 14th.

I think he fills in an important part of the background. Furthermore, dear boy, it confirms what we already know of your father's intention to leave the country on the night of October 14th.
